programme.desc: Diandra has a kind, gentle and loving nature. He and his sister Elsa live happily with their father, Harun. programme.title: Naik Ranjang
programme.desc: After being separated for 20 years, Tyas tries to find her father, Mahdi, to be the guardian of her marriage to Gino. After meeting Mahdi, Tyas fiance, Gino is shocked to find Hani, Tyas sister who has a child from their past relationship. Gino plans to get rid of Hani to hide his secret in order to smoothen his marriage with Tyas.

programme.title: Seharum Cinta Melati
programme.desc: Melati and Wiras marriage began to crumble when Niar, Melatis mother-in-law, who longed for a male grandchild to carry on the Baraguna family line, forced Melati to give up Wira so he could enter into a secret marriage. Things became even more complicated when Aura and Rivat appeared. Will Melatis sacrifice lead to happiness?

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Arpo teaches Daniel lessons about safety and science, from earthquake drills to the magic of magnets, making every day a fun learning adventure.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: The big day is here! Follow JJ on his first-ever day of school, from riding the bus to meeting new friends in the classroom.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Meekah
programme.desc: Meekah is learning all about animals! She gets to feed a friendly giraffe and then meets some amazing dinosaurs from the past.

programme.title: Meekah
programme.desc: Its time for fun and games! Meekah bakes a beautiful cake and then heads to an indoor playground for a day of climbing and sliding.

programme.title: Air Asia Buds Adventures
programme.desc: Its time for a high-flying adventure with the Air Asia Buds! Join them as they explore a busy fire station, visit a fun-filled farm, and learn all about amazing animals. Their journey takes them to incredible destinations around the world, from the vibrant streets of Bangkok and the beautiful beaches of the Philippines to the bustling city of Kuala Lumpur. Its a non-stop trip full of fun, learning, and discovery.

programme.title: VeeFriends
programme.desc: The fun and friendly battles cant be stopped! The VeeFriends keep the good times rolling with a fast-paced game of hot potato and a limbo challenge that tests their flexibility. The competition gets creative with a costume contest to see who has the best disguise, followed by a wild dance-off. From seeing who can build the best fort to a game of the floor is lava, the fun-tastic battles are non-stop.

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: How does a recycling truck work? What happens on a farm? Will this object Sink or Float? Blippi explores the world around us with silly dance moves, fun songs, and awesome adventures. There is so much to learn about, it will make you want to shout BLIPPI!

programme.title: Blippi

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Fateha dan Rohana terkejut apabila mengetahui Fawwaz adalah anak Fazira hasil hubungan terlarang dengan Raja Azali iaitu kekasih Fateha. Pada mulanya mereka tidak percaya tetapi ketika mereka hendak mendapatkan penjelasan daripada Raja Azali, Raja Azali telah ditangkap polis atas beberapa tuduhan merogol. Fariz meminta maaf di atas sikap Rohana selama ini. Ainnura telah lama memaafkan Rohana tetapi mahu Fariz menceraikannya kerana dia tidak mahu Fariz menjadi anak derhaka gara-garanya. Rohana terharu dengan sikap baik Ainnura dan merayu kemaafan daripada Ainnura.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Reaksi Dr Aish terhadap kejutan yang dibuat oleh Dr Erin berlainan daripada apa yang Dr Erin harapkan. Pian mula rapat dengan Icha. Baby belajar cara untuk menguruskan pesakit.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Dr Aish berasa tidak selesa pabila Dr Erin cuba untuk mengetahui lebih lanjut tentang masa silamnya. Mika terkenangkan arwah ibunya apabila bertemu dengan seorang pesakit wanita yang sudah berumur.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Mika mula cemburu apabila melihat Oya rapat dengan Dr Aish. Seorang pemuda tampan mula mendekati Dr Erin. Harun mengusulkan sesuatu kepada Pian untuk merawati masalahnya itu.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Ramai yang terkejut bila mengetahu Dr Aish mahu berhenti kerja secara tiba-tiba. Oya diteguri kerana tidak focus di dalam kuliah. Kerana mash cemburu, Mika mula tidak endahkan Oya.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Japor mula merancang untuk mencari kenalan gadis yang baru. Mika meminta bantuan Japor untuk memikat wanita. Mika resah kerana belum berjaya mendapatkan pekerjaan.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Tok Wan, Ilah berhasrat untuk membatalkan perkahwinan Ainnura dengan Fariz. Bagaimanapun Ainnura bertegas untuk meneruskan rancangan mereka kerana itu juga yang dimahukan oleh Tok Wan demi meliah keluarga Ainnura dan keluarga Fariz berdamai. Rohana menyokong keputusan Ainnura dan ini menyebabkan Ilah kecil hati dengan Ainnura. Ilah akhirnya tidak hadir pada hari perkahwinan Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Sikap prihatin dan baik Rohana terhadap Ainnura akhirnya terbongkar apabila tujuan Rohana merestui hasrat Fariz untuk megahwini Ainnura hanyalah semata-mata untuk membalas dendam pada Ainnura. Rohana paksa Ainnura tinggal bersamanya dan jika Ainnura menujuk Fariz supaya keluar dari rumah tersebut, dia tidak halal susu yang diminum oleh Fariz serta menganggap Fariz anak derhaka. Sementara itu, dalam diam Ilah sebenarnya merindui Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Rohana sengaja menyeksa fizikal dan mental Ainnura. Fazira melihat apa yang dilakukan oleh Rohana terhadap Ainnura lalu mendesak Ainnura dan Fariz keluar dari rumah tersebut. Bagaimanapun Ainnura enggan kerana tidak mahu Fariz dianggap sebagai anak derhaka. Gara-hara terlalu marah dengan Ainnura, Rohana telah menghentak kepala Ainnura ke dinding. Fariz perasan dengan bengkak di kepala Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura berbohong dengan Fariz yang bengkak di kepalanya akiat terhantuk pada sinki. Dalam waktu yang sama, Rohana mendakwa Ainnura sengaja menolaknya sehinggakan dia hampir terjatuh. Fateha menyokong kata-kata Rohana, menyebabkan Fariz keliru siapakah yang benar di antara isteri dan ibunya. Ainnura bangkit mempertahankan haknya. Selain daripada Ainnura, Fawwaz turut menjadi mangsa Rohana dan Fateha dengan pelbagai penghinaan sehingga akhirnya kerana tidak sanggup melihat Fawwaz dihina, Fazira mengakui yang Fawwaz adalah anaknya.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang

Fariz meminta maaf di atas sikap Rohana selama ini. Ainnura telah lama memaafkan Rohana tetapi mahu Fariz menceraikannya kerana dia tidak mahu Fariz menjadi anak derhaka gara-garanya. Rohana terharu dengan sikap baik Ainnura dan merayu kemaafan daripada Ainnura.

programme.title: The Day

programme.title: Cupid
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang ejen yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat penghancur jodoh yang ditugaskan untuk memikat seorang wanita supaya dapat melupakan suaminya yang telah diisytiharkan meninggal dunia. Namun dia jatuh cinta pada wanita tersebut

programme.title: Cerai
programme.desc: Pengalaman berkurung dengan pasangan selama musim PKP memaksa dua pasangan suami isteri menilai semula perkahwinan mereka yang telah disalah ertikan selama ini.

programme.title: Hingga Jumpa Lagi
programme.desc: Eva is diagnosed with cancer and prays that she could travel back to the past in order to prevent the love between her and her husband so that her husband can lead a happy life. Her prayer is granted

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli and Badariah are always arguing, but in order to prevent the factory where they work from being closed by Qarina, they must work together. Out of hatred, they start feeling for each other.

programme.title: Jihan Nak Displin Anak
programme.desc: Jihan dan suami kalut apabila anak mereka tidak mahu pulang beraya di kampung. Mereka cuba untuk mendisiplinkan anak mereka sebelum hari raya

programme.title: Satu Kampung Dua Orang
programme.desc: Selepas banjir besar melanda, semua penduduk kampung berpindah kerana kampung mereka tidak lagi selamat. Hanya dua beradik yang enggan berpindah atas sebab dan alasan mereka tersendiri.

programme.title: Jamil Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Kisah perjalanan Jamil pulang ke kampung untuk meminang kekasihnya setelah pinangannya pernah ditolak beberapa kali. Berjayakah misi Jamil kali ini?

programme.title: Sampai Nanti
programme.desc: Kyle dan Milly bertemu kembali setelah 10 tahun terpisah dan cinta lama kembali terjalin. Tetapi adakah cinta mereka akan terus kekal hingga ke akhirnya?

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Karim adalah pemilik kedai cendol bersebelahan dengan kedai asam pedas Kalsom. Mereka bermusuhan, tetapi anak mereka Kinah dan Khalil mencintai satu sama lain, dan terpaksa menyembunyikan perkara ini bagi mengelakkan perang antara dua kedai mereka.

programme.title: Tolong Saya Encik Dinosaur
programme.desc: Elly berpindah dari bandar ke pekan kecil untuk mencari ketenangan. Tetapi kenangan buruk tetap menghantui dirinya, sehinggalah dia bertemu dengan Karl yang mengajarnya erti sebuah kebahagiaan.

programme.title: Cubit - Cubit Cinta
programme.desc: Kupid Cubit is a dating app that enables the masses to find love. But for Katarina and Saiful, its a platform for healing people with unrequited love.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Duit Kawin
programme.desc: Memaparkan pemikiran remaja sekarang terhadap perkahwinan dari sudut kos atas syariat agama tetapi tertekan cara hidup zaman kini yang mahukan kemewahan.

programme.title: Biarkan Cinta Tersenyum Lagi
programme.desc: Kisah penulis lagu Maya Arisa yang menghidap tumor otak dan mengimpikan untuk berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya bertemu dengan seorang jurugambar bernama Redza.

programme.title: Ayat Dari Langit
programme.desc: Ustaz Muiz dan isterinya mengajar ajaran sesat dan mahu pengikutnya mengikut telunjuk mereka yang lama kelamaan mula membuatkan pengikutnya bernama Kamal mula merasa sangsi.

programme.title: Cinta Round 1
programme.desc: Farid is a nerdy guy who always been bullied by Syakirin, his senior. Farid determined to enter an MMA tournament organized by their university so to put an end to being bullied by Syakirin.

programme.title: Racun Suami Jahanam
programme.desc: Suraya is a naive village girl who looks forward to happy days when Hazrul proposes to her. But those happy days are only temporary when she learns who Hazrul really is.

programme.title: 6 Hari
programme.desc: Suzi is content with being a third wife and living alone in her bungalow as she only entertains her husband every 6 days. Everything comes crashing when a person from her past returns to her life.

programme.title: Please Subscribe Cintaku
programme.desc: Hannah and her friend Alia have gone to an abandoned construction site to find material for her YouTube channel, but she unknowingly records a murder.

programme.title: Diva Dari Jakarta
programme.desc: Erin dan Ejot sering dibandingkan dari segi paras rupa. Sehingga suatu hari sesuatu telah berlaku kepada Erin yang mengubah segalanya.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Nasiya
programme.desc: Ketika melarikan diri dari bekas suaminya, Ihyana telah mengalami kemalangan tetapi dia bernasib baik kerana telah diselamatkan oleh satu entiti luar biasa yang telah mengubah kelakuannya.

programme.title: Suamiku Encik Beruang
programme.desc: Ani, the most beautiful girl in the village, who is ever mans fantasy, decides to marry Mr. Bear as her husband, much to everyones surprise. As for the chief village, he intend to organise the wedding of the year.

programme.title: Menanti Hari Itu
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu terhadap anak kandungnya yang tidak pernah terpadam meskipun si anak menjauhkan diri akibat hasutan keluarga angkatnya sendiri.

programme.title: Kecundang Sebelum Menjanda
programme.desc: Hari terbahagia dalam hidup Nora berubah menjadi suram bila tunangnya menarik diri pada hari pernikahan mereka. Tambah buruk lagi, hari selepas tragedi itu asyik berulang atas sebab-sebab misteri.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Aku Raja Lawak
programme.desc: Silah nak jadi pelawak yang terkenal, cuma di kampungnya tak ada peluang pekerjaan pelawak sepenuh masa. Tapi dia tetap mendapat sokongan padu daripada peminat nombor satunya iaitu Faris, anaknya.

programme.title: Bayangan Emilia
programme.desc: Rita berpindah masuk ke banglo Ungku Mahmud dan mula merasai akan kehadiran roh yang seperti tidak senang dengan kehadirannya disitu. Apakah misteri di sebalik rumah banglo tersebut?

programme.title: Oh Speak English Please
programme.desc: Kisah Sally anak remaja moden yang merasa malu dengan ibunya kerana tidak pandai berbahasa Inggeris dan berketrampilan agak kekampungan. Lakonan Rozita Che Wan dan Zahirah MacWilson.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: The Jews of Eastern Europe are being massacred by the thousands. Galvanised into action after the death of his wife, Hungarian barrister Sonson finds himself leading an inspirational fight back against the increasingly desperate and dangerous Nazis.

programme.title: Override
programme.desc: In 2040, a female humanoid A.I. is hacked by her husband and forced to kidnap the U.S. vice presidents son and execute him on live television.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween.

programme.title: Johnny And Clyde
programme.desc: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are on an endless crime spree. They decide to assemble a group of criminals and misfits to steal from Alanas casino and pull off the heist of the century.

programme.title: Project Legion
programme.desc: A young man trapped in his apartment with a swarm of demons outside his door must find a way to survive the night and escape from apartment 213.

programme.title: Chosen Family
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Broadcast
programme.desc: After a billionaire creates a drug called INOC which stops the aging process, the future of a world where death no longer exists is seen. The story of the fate of mankind is told while also revealing an elusive truth to its unknowing spectator.

programme.title: Hunting Games
programme.desc: Two dangerous armed men must hunt each other and fight to death over millions of dollars in cash in this high octane wilderness survival story.

programme.title: Mayfair - Shooting Paul
programme.desc: Hoping to put the past behind him and go legit, Max is persuaded by Paul to open a new Mister Mayfair club in Portugal. Conflict, however, seems to follow Max wherever he goes. Drawn into a violent turf war between London Gangsters and the Italian Mafia, his relationship with Ava is jeopardised by the arrival of his former flame, Serena. Maxs carefully crafted world seems to be collapsing around him. With his familys lives on the line, Max is blackmailed by British crime boss, Tommy, to assassinate his best friend, Paul.

programme.title: Hideout
programme.desc: Evading police at a remote farmhouse after fumbling a robbery, four criminals discover that the family living there is not who they appear to be.

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: After a lightning strike kills the lead singer of a band, she is resurrected with electrifying special abilities.

programme.title: Blindfire
programme.desc: A police officer who while responding to a violent hostage call, kills the African American suspect only to later learn of his innocence. Sensing this was a set-up, and facing repercussions, he must track down the person responsible while examining his own accountability and the ingrained racism which brought him to this point.

programme.title: Chosen Family
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - A Song To Kill For
programme.desc: Max Mayfair has it all; a beautiful girlfriend, Ava, a new London crime family, and thanks to his latest heist, a priceless diamond necklace. However, when mafioso Calbones henchmen catch up with Mike and Armen, determined to drag them back to New York to pay for their crimes, Max has everything to lose. Teaming up with his old friend, Marseille Mafia crime boss, Paul, Max hatches a plan to lure the New York Mafia to Mayfair.

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page, a brilliant mother-daughter swindler team, target the citys wealthiest men. Max marries them and then sues for alimony after she catches them involved in an affair with Page.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - The Spyce Of Life
programme.desc: Returning from a romantic getaway with Ava, Max finds himself on the wrong side of the law yet again. Now blackmailed by MI6, Max must spy on two suspected terrorists; Aziz and Omar, who are regular customers at his club. Accompanied by his London crime family, Max breaks into Omars country estate and discovers his sinister plan. With everything on the line, Max must race to uncover a highly skilled hackers identity before its too late.

programme.title: Johnny And Clyde
programme.desc: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are on an endless crime spree. They decide to assemble a group of criminals and misfits to steal from Alanas casino and pull off the heist of the century.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - Serenas Game
programme.desc: Refusing to comply with Tommys demands, Max and Paul conspire to have the British gangster eliminated and Serena arrested. With Tommy dead and Serena in handcuffs, it appears as though Max has succeeded. His plan goes awry, however, when MI6 force Max to help Serena bring down her employers: the Russian mob. Torn between a life of crime with Serena or happiness with Ava, nothing is ever simple in the life of Max Mayfair.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two Brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right.

programme.title: Enter The Clones of Bruce
programme.desc: Enter the Clones of Bruce dives into the Bruce Lee exploitation craze, otherwise known as Bruceploitation.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesnt die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

programme.title: FAN FAVORITES

programme.title: Saka Sisters

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: Surviving in the African savanna requires wit and guile, especially for two of its hunters: African wild dogs and dwarf mongooses.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: A complex web of relationships rules all life on earth: all species are interconnected, none can survive in isolation. While some relationships are one-sided, others are mutually beneficial.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the teams solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Check out vet Phils clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Join the teams scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey whos having seizures.

programme.title: Wildlife ER

programme.desc: Venture along Earths coasts, where colliding worlds create a melting pot of biodiversity. Watch orcas hunt with precision, hold on as guillemot chicks take leaps of faith, crawl to safety with turtle hatchlings, and see crabs sculpt sandy galaxies.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to do the scarecrow dance! Help Sunny the Scarecrow scare away some pesky pigeons to protect the farms crops. Its harvest time, so everyone helps pick the vegetables. Find a safe and quiet place for a hedgehog to hibernate for the winter. Plus, sing a song about Pablo the Pig and Carlos the Calf and get ready for a campfire sing-along.

programme.title: Nina Time
programme.desc: Get ready for Ninas song and dance! The friends dance with all the baby animals at the petting zoo. They go on a scavenger hunt to find flowers that match the colors of the rainbow. They dream of flying high in the sky like their pilot dad. Nina chases a surprise egg through the grocery store and tries to catch bubbles without popping them. Plus, she celebrates her birthday with a piata and learns some healthy habits.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Get ready to sing some animal songs! Visit Old MacDonalds farm to learn about all the animals and count his vegetables. The kids learn about animal sounds and go on a prehistoric adventure with Mr. Dino. They also go fishing, sing about Bingo at the beach and help a cheeky black sheep escape from the farmer.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its Little Angel! Where baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill inspire kids and families to have fun and to grow and learn through play. Come sing along!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: The sun is shining, and its a perfect day for the playground! Join Baby John as he explores the swings, the slide, and the sandbox. Along the way, he learns valuable lessons about how to take turns with his friends and why sharing his toys makes every game more fun for everyone. Its a story about the joy of playing together.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster is a cute and cheeky little bus with an adventurous spirit and an inquisitive mind. More than anything else, he loves exploring his high-tech hometown Wheelieville, riding into adventures both big and small with his vehicle friends The Bumper Bunch.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Prepare for pandemonium! Arpo and Daniels attempt at gardening takes a dangerous turn when their plant grows into a monstrous creature that tries to eat everyone. As if thats not enough, the new smart house system goes haywire, and the furniture starts a rebellion. Its up to Arpo to fix the pandemonium in this action-packed adventure.

programme.title: Cody Time
programme.desc: Singing is always fun with Cody and his friends! He uses his imagination to play with a simple cardboard box and solves a mystery of ten missing buses. When Cody gets upset, he learns to handle his emotions in a healthy way. He has a playdate with Nina where they learn the value of sharing, helps his dad cook delicious vegetables and discovers that even when plans dont work out, friends can make any day a special day.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Press play on a day of musical fun! Follow JJ and his friends as they go on adventures, with a special song for every moment. They sing about their families, their animal friends, and the fun of playing together. This story is a journey through the wonderful, song-filled world of CoComelon.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: This story is a celebration of family! Follow JJ through a day spent with the people he loves most. He sings a special song for his mommy and another for his daddy, showing how much he appreciates them. Its a heartwarming tale about the joy and love that comes from being with your family.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Every day is an adventure with Mila and her best friend, Morphle! When a ball gets stuck in a tree or a friend needs help, Mila knows just what to do. Morphle can morph into a ladder, a fire truck, or anything she can imagine, turning everyday problems into exciting, magical solutions and proving that hes the best magic pet a girl could ask for.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: A strange magic is bringing objects to life all over Petport, and Jordie is the first to notice when his bed sprouts legs and runs away! While chasing it, Mila and Morphle discover the problem is bigger than they thought, as they must also wrangle a magic carpet on a wild flight. Their adventure is a frantic chase to catch and calm the enchanted items causing chaos across the city.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: A wave of monster truck madness is taking over Petport! The mischievous Orphle is using his magic to transform every vehicle he sees-from fire engines to ice cream vans-into giant, rumbling monster trucks. To stop the city-wide destruction and return things to normal, Morphle must morph into a series of powerful monster trucks himself and challenge his naughty twin in a high-octane showdown.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Baby Truck is always ready for an adventure, and today hes leading his friends on an exciting exploration! Their playtime takes a messy turn when Baby Trucks curiosity gets the better of him, and he ends up stuck deep in the mud. It looks like hes in real trouble, but his friends wont leave him behind. This is a wonderful tale of how the smallest heroes, working together as a team, can solve even the stickiest of problems.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Geckos Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether its fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle thats stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Get ready for fun and play at the garage! Weasel gets carried away by his own advertising blimp and Gecko has to rescue him with a bouncy castle. The team takes an imaginary trip to outer space and modifies Baby Truck into a rocket. They turn a fire hose into a wacky waterslide to cool off on a hot day and have a baby race with a pit stop.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its Little Angel! Where baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill inspire kids and families to have fun and to grow and learn through play. Come sing along!

programme.title: Little Angel

From helping with tools to trying to be strong and brave, its a loving tribute to the special bond between a father and his son, and the hero that Daddy is in his eyes.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Jump into a world of music and fun with Baby John! Follow him through a day where every moment has a special song. He sings about his loving family, explores the sounds that animals make on the farm, and celebrates all the things that make his life a happy and song-filled adventure.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready to sing your heart out with Mia! She and her friend Bari pretend to be bakers and make yummy cupcakes. She and her dad take a splashy ride in her car on a rainy day. She and her friend Maple learn about big and small while playing in the garden. She also learns about avocados, kangaroos and how to make her own instruments.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along with all your favorite friends! When Miss Pollys dolly gets sick, Twinkle and Mummy are there to help. The family takes a sleepy bus ride home and the kids learn to be nimble and brave at the ball pit. They make their own instruments, learn about colors and have a fun day at the farm. Its a day of music, learning and fun!

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Its time to shake your little baby bum! The friends have a fun dance party in the park. The mummy monkeys teach the little ones a calming breathing song. The friends play in the sandpit and go on a fishing adventure. They play Jack and Jill, learn some cute actions from Grandma Panda and have a tea party. Its a day full of singing, dancing and playing!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Join JJ for a fantastic sing-along! Learn how to make all kinds of pasta with Grandma. Visit the new petting zoo at the farm and meet all the adorable baby animals. After a fun day, learn why its important to clean up. Give Bingo a bath to get him sparkly clean and then have a surprise picnic for Mom and Dad. Its a day full of fantastic fun and songs!

Afterward, its time to head to the kitchen for a musical Pat-a-Cake session. This is a story about the simple joys of playing, laughing, and making wonderful memories together.

He and Scout race to get a new siren and he tries on new tires that are all the wrong size. He even becomes an ambulance bus to save his friend and a disco detective to find a lost friend in a disco tunnel.

So he calls in his old friend Jada and with the help of Buster the Bus, they can still save Christmas and make sure everyone gets their presents on time. programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time to sing along with JJ through a day of adventures! Join the exciting doggy hunt to find Bingo on his birthday. Use your imagination to play the floor is lava with the family. Learn how to take care of pets and see all the kids favorite toys during Play and Tell at school. Get a surprise visit from a real fire engine and join a Thanksgiving feast that celebrates family and friends.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Follow our favorite curious baby, Baby John, through a day of exciting discoveries. Watch him learn new things during playtime, interact with his loving family at the dinner table, and get ready for bed after a long and happy day of fun. Its a heartwarming look at the small but wonderful moments in a babys day.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its Little Angel! Where baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill inspire kids and families to have fun and to grow and learn through play. Come sing along!

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is a wonderful place! Join Blippi Wonders as he learns about creatures of all shapes and sizes. He discovers how a caterpillar turns into a butterfly, why a camel has a hump, and what makes a whale so big. From the jungle to the farm, its an animal adventure full of fun and fascinating facts.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Come along on fun adventures as Blippi journeys off in his BlippiMobile to answer burning questions such as How does a rainbow get its colors? and why is Blippis popsicle melting?. Luckily he has his faithful sidekicks TABBS and D.BO to help him find the answers.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Every day is an adventure with ARPO and Daniel! Watch them play hide-and-seek, try to convince Daniel to eat his veggies, and build an amazing treehouse. Along the way, theyll deal with pesky squirrels and mysterious noises. These stories are all about friendship, problem-solving, and having fun together.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time for some fun with friends! In this playful story, JJ and his best pals learn how to share their toys and work together as a team. From the playground to the classroom, they discover that every activity is more fun when you do it with friends. Its a musical celebration of teamwork and friendship.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready to learn with JJ! Embark on a musical journey that starts with the ABC Song, making it fun to learn every letter. Once youve mastered the alphabet, the adventure continues with a trip back in time to count from one to ten with a group of silly dinosaurs. Its a fun-filled lesson that makes learning feel like a game.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: My Magic Pet Morphle follows the adventures of Mila and her magical morphing pet, Morphle. Whether they need to stop a magic pet who doesnt know how to control their powers, the town Bandits from stealing things, or the mischievous Orphle from causing havoc, Mila and Morphle always work together to help out!

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: From stopping bullies to fixing broken toys, theres no problem too big or small for Morphle! In this magical adventure, Milas pet morphs into all sorts of incredible things-a giant construction vehicle, a speeding race car, a mighty T-Rex-to help people and protect the city. Its a showcase of Morphles most amazing and heroic transformations.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Rob the writer needs some help! When he cant finish the story hes writing, the crew heads to the Story Book Planet to find the perfect ending. Afterwards, wanting to meet a real knight, they take a trip to the Medieval Planet, but the knight they find has no manners at all!

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Get ready for some ups and downs! After a series of mishaps on the Elevator Planet, Orbit learns that being honest and taking responsibility is the best way to solve a problem. Later, Rob and Ema are eager to show off their aviation knowledge on the Aviation Planet but end up taking off in an unexpected direction.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum follows the musical adventures of Mia, Twinkle the Star and Baby Max. Everyday moments like bath time, getting dressed, or playing peekaboo become even more fun with new and classic nursery rhymes.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for a nursery rhyme fun time! The friends pretend to row their boats in laundry baskets. They do a fun Hop Little Bunnies dance and play Ring-A-Ring O Roses in the garden. They build a bridge with blocks and Mr. Giraffe takes them all for a ride on the bus. Plus, they help two little birds and have a parade with homemade instruments.

programme.title: Go Buster: Specials
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve, but Santa has an accident and wont be able to fly his sleigh. So he calls in his old friend Jada and with the help of Buster the Bus, they can still save Christmas and make sure everyone gets their presents on time. Its a race against time, but Buster is up for the challenge!

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Learn how to stay clean and healthy with Buster! When Buster gets stuck in the mud and then a slimy green puddle, he needs to go to the carwash to get clean. After getting a wobbly tooth from eating too many sweets, he learns about the importance of good dental hygiene. Plus, see what happens when Buster gets sick and his friend Scout fetches Amber the Ambulance to help him feel better.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Geckos Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether its fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle thats stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Baby Truck is always ready for an adventure, and today hes leading his friends on an exciting exploration! Their playtime takes a messy turn when Baby Trucks curiosity gets the better of him, and he ends up stuck deep in the mud. It looks like hes in real trouble, but his friends wont leave him behind. This is a wonderful tale of how the smallest heroes, working together as a team, can solve even the stickiest of problems.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Welcome to the learning city farm! Help Ella count all the buses as they drive by. Join Grandma Mei for a fun and active dance session. Make a healthy salad while dancing the salsa and learn how to recycle to save the planet. Plus, learn a silly song to cheer up a friend and celebrate everything that grows with the Growing Song.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Welcome to the fantastical planet of Bod, home to the Minibods. Join six furry baby friends as they get up to hilarious mayhem, turning everyday situations into unexpected, super silly events. Whatever life throws their way, the Minibods overcome hurdles the unconventional way, to better understand themselves and the world around them.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Its party time with Pogo! Hes invited to Jeffs party, but they cant agree on what kind of party it should be. Bubbles invents a new bouncy blob that gets out of control. When Lulu loses her favorite bunny, Bubbles becomes her superhero and helps her find it. Plus, Fuse learns that eating his greens will give him more energy.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day for an animal adventure! Join JJ as he visits a farm to sing Old MacDonald with all the animals. The fun continues as he learns about the sounds animals make and dances along with them. This musical story is a delightful journey into the wonderful world of our furry and feathered friends.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its always cool to be cool on Lellobee City Farm! A penguin visits and teaches everyone how to stay cool on a hot day. A new rooster is having trouble remembering how to crow, but Ella helps him figure it out. The ducklings have their first flying lesson and the friends clean out the pond to give the animals a nice new home. Plus, celebrate the Moon Festival with a special party.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to do the scarecrow dance! Help Sunny the Scarecrow scare away some pesky pigeons to protect the farms crops. Its harvest time, so everyone helps pick the vegetables. Find a safe and quiet place for a hedgehog to hibernate for the winter. Plus, sing a song about Pablo the Pig and Carlos the Calf and get ready for a campfire sing-along.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for some sweet evening songs. Daddy helps Max get ready for bed with a bath and a story. The family goes to the supermarket and on the way, they practice waving hello and goodbye. Mia and Max count all the buses they see on the way to school. The family learns about what to wear in any weather and Daddy makes fun shadow puppets on the wall.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Wind down your day with an evening sing-along! When the stars dont come out, TomTom finds a creative way to make a starry night for JJ. The kids challenge their parents to a fun soccer match. Get excited for the first day back at school where youll learn all about fire drills, make a colorful kaleidoscope and see that its okay when accidents happen.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: The day is over, and its time to relax with some gentle music. Join Baby John for a peaceful evening sing-along. He and his family sing calm and soothing songs that are perfect for cuddling up together before bedtime. Its a wonderful way to end a busy day with love and music.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum: Lullabies
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is here to help you fall to sleep with soothing, relaxing animated lullabies. These gentle and sensory videos are accompanied by lullaby versions of much-loved nursery rhymes, helping to take you to the land of nod.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: This story is a celebration of family! Follow JJ through a day spent with the people he loves most. He sings a special song for his mommy and another for his daddy, showing how much he appreciates them. Its a heartwarming tale about the joy and love that comes from being with your family.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: The school bell is ringing for the very first time for JJ! Join him on the exciting journey of his first day of school. Hell learn how to ride the bus, meet his friendly teacher, and make a whole new group of friends. This story shows that school is a wonderful place for learning, playing, and making new memories.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Welcome to the fantastical planet of Bod, home to the Minibods. Join six furry baby friends as they get up to hilarious mayhem, turning everyday situations into unexpected, super silly events. Whatever life throws their way, the Minibods overcome hurdles the unconventional way, to better understand themselves and the world around them.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Who will be the winner? Newt really wants to win a gold star at the gym, but she keeps losing. Lulu is so excited for the funfair that she keeps jumping the line and upsetting her friends. Bubbles accidentally scrapes the paint on Jeffs ceiling and tries to fix it herself. At bedtime, Pogo wants to play, but everyone else is ready to sleep.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Its a day of pure adventure for Gecko and his friends! The fun starts when a brand new bouncy castle arrives at the garage. Afterward, the weather turns chilly, and the trucks have a wonderful time playing in the snow. This story is all about finding fun and excitement in every situation.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Geckos Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether its fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle thats stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to explore Earth and nature! A frog ballerina shows Ella that rain can be fun and is important for the farm. The friends celebrate Earth Day by litter picking and composting. When some of the animals get sick, Ella helps the vet at a makeshift animal hospital. Plus, watch a caterpillar turn into a butterfly and learn some yoga moves with Rishis mom.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. She and Rishi play a game of I Hear With My Little Ear to find all the animals on the farm. Do the ABC dance, go stargazing with Grandma Mei and take care of five mischievous monkeys. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Eps 01 Roz menjalani kehidupan normal sebagai seorang opah setelah pencen dari kerjaya lamanya iaitu ejen perisik. Suatu hari, cucunya Rin, telah menggodam satu permainan komputer dan dia dihubungi oleh seorang misteri dalam talian yang mengetahui identiti Rin. Roz mengesyaki sesuatu tidak kena, tapi malangnya Rin telah diculik oleh penjahat misteri tersebut sebelum Roz sempat bertindak.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep02 Roz cuba menenangkan Indah yang risaukan Rin dan Daniel yang telah mulakan penyiasatan. Namun Daniel tidak mahu mendengar nasihat ibunya, Roz. Daniel dan Roz menggunakan cara berbeza untuk mencari Rin. Pihak polis menerima rakaman pesanan suara Rin.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep03 Roz kembali beraksi setelah lama bersara, dengan bantuan Ejen Mah. Dia sampai ke lokasi yang disangkakan Rin ada di situ, malangnya pihak polis dan Daniel juga sampai ke situ. Daniel menyerang Roz kerana dia sangka Roz adalah penculik. Roz cuba melindungi identitinya sebagai seorang perisik.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep04 Roz, Datin Seri dan Ejen Mah kembali beraksi untuk menolong Roz menyelamatkan cucunya, Rin. Mereka dapat mengesan lokasi sebenar Rin dan menyelamatkannya sebelum Daniel dan polis tiba. Rin kini tahu identiti sebenar Opah Roz.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep05 Kegembiraan Roz dapat menyelamatkan Rin terbantut apabila penculik Rin telah melepaskan diri daripada tahanan polis. Roz juga mengaitkan kes penculikan Rin dengan kes Dr Kaos Jr yang terlepas dari penjara dengan rancangan jahat yang lebih besar.

programme.title: #Tom Tom Bak Series
programme.desc: Datuk Aznil Haji Nawawi turun padang sempena pencarian bakat baru #TomTomBak. Ramai yang hadir untuk menonjolkan bakat yang mereka ada. Bermacam ragam And aksi lucu dapat kita saksikan. Anak-anak yang petah berborak juga turut dicari untuk musim terbaru ini.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Aly dan geng di perkenalkan kepada Ramona, yang memerlukan bantuan mereka untuk merakam video untuknya, yang sebagai gantinya, berjanji akan membuat video promo untuk kedai ayah Aly

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Mesin pencetak kedai Bob tiba-tiba rosak dan perlu diperbaiki. Aly dan geng mesti bergabung bersama untuk memperbaikinya untuk pelanggan. Namun, Nabil dan Eu Jin tidak hadir kerana mereka obses terhadap Akses Premium untuk permainan yang mereka mainkan.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Mesin pencetak kedai Bob tiba-tiba rosak dan perlu diperbaiki. Aly dan geng Seorang pelanggan mencabar Aly untuk membuat produk untuknya, di mana dia belajar dengan bantuan rakan-rakannya apa yang diperlukan untuk merancang And membina penemuan baru sambil tetap teratur dan fokus.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Ramona meminta bantuan Geng untuk menjadi influencer terkenal, di mana Aly dan geng membantunya membuat filter baru menggunakan kod mereka. Melalui usaha mereka, Ramona mempelajari bagaimana sikap pengguna dalam talian, sekaligus Aly dan geng membantu Ramona menghadapi masalahnya.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Geng menemui bakat terpendam Eu Jin, iaitu menyanyi! Mereka semua berusaha untuk membuat lagu baru yang hebat dengan merakam audio dan muzik dengan pengkodan mereka sendiri, tetapi tanpa mengendahkan keinginan Eu Jin - yang akhirnya merasakan dirinya dipergunakan oleh geng.

Daniel menyerang Roz kerana dia sangka Roz adalah penculik. Roz cuba melindungi identitinya sebagai seorang perisik.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep04 Roz, Datin Seri dan Ejen Mah kembali beraksi untuk menolong Roz menyelamatkan cucunya, Rin. Mereka dapat mengesan lokasi sebenar Rin dan menyelamatkannya sebelum Daniel dan polis tiba. Rin kini tahu identiti sebenar Opah Roz.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep05 Kegembiraan Roz dapat menyelamatkan Rin terbantut apabila penculik Rin telah melepaskan diri daripada tahanan polis. Roz juga mengaitkan kes penculikan Rin dengan kes Dr Kaos Jr yang terlepas dari penjara dengan rancangan jahat yang lebih besar.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The era of high housing prices shocks the masses. However, some are willing to live in the mountains for their beloved parrots, just to give them the best breeding environment. Parrots have a long lifespan and their IQ is comparable to that of a five-year-old child. How do you make them behave? Training is actually a good way, but how? Melon seeds are key to the goal. If you want to raise a parrot, there are in fact many restrictions on choosing the right one. How should I put it? Dont miss Cute Pet Guide!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt has a heavyweight problem to tackle -V Kifarou, one of Flamingolands male white rhinos, has a skin infection. At Matts surgery, he operates on a kestrel with a broken wing. When wildlife rescuer Jean Thorpe arrives to collect the patient, Matt has another bundle for her, a poorly duck with suspected lead poisoning.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In the West Midlands a local vet has reported serious concern for a young dog thats recently left her surgery. The owners had refused to let the vets properly treat little Lola even though she had quite severe injuries. Inspector Herchy Boal has been called to help track down the owners and as its such a young puppy its critical Herchy finds her before its too late.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In the West Midlands Inspector Herchy Boal receives an anonymous call about a labradoodle who is reportedly underweight with infected ears and dirty matted fur. Its up to Herchy to get to the bottom of this reported neglect.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The meerkat king from Madagascar is funny, but meerkats in real life are well-behaved, cuddly and they heal our hearts! Pocket sized pets are currently all the rage, but there are details you need to pay attention to when raising them. For example, hedgehogs are highly defensive, timid sugar gliders will harm themselves without being next to their owners, and cute guinea pigs like Norman from the movie The Secret Life of Pets are easily abandoned due to being easy to obtain and raise, etc. Dont worry, experts will teach you how to raise them! Come to a restaurant in Kaohsiung to get up close with Rocket Raccoon from The Avengers!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve scoured the internet clean to bring you the most entertaining puppy clips out there: overexcited pups, pilfering pups, pups who fall asleep in their dinner bowls, puppy vloggers, driving pups, and even a look at the latest craze: pups who go into a quivering frenzy at the sight of-K doorstoppers.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In Essex Animal Collection officer Joe Whites on his way to pick up a dog thats been left abandoned and tethered to the edge of a bridge. Last year the charity received over 63,000 reports of abandoned animals, and nearly half of those were dogs. When Joe arrives in Harlow, the lady who found the dog has moved him to a place of safety and is waiting with a couple of concerned neighbours. With his bones clearly visible through his already skinny frame, the poor dog is worryingly thin. But a lack of food isnt all thats wrong, there are scars on his face and body that suggest hes been through a hard youth. To try and piece together the dogs history Joe needs all the information he can gather.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Ali the elephant at Shoushan Zoo, carries the childhood memories of many children, both young and old. Although he is now 49 years old, he is still energetic under the care of the keepers. Once the new zoo is completed, the public will be able to see Ali again. When the caregiver helps Ali take a shower, Ali will take the opportunity to replenish his body with water; sometimes he will step on water in the pool and use his nose to enjoy the fun of playing in the water. nThere are currently only three African elephants in Taiwan. In addition to Ali, the other two are in the Taipei City Zoo. Because African elephants are endangered wild animals, their import and export are strictly controlled. If these three elephants die in the future, Taiwan may no longer see any African elephants. Shoushan Zoo vows to take good care of Ali so that Alis heartwarming story can continue, and shoulder the mission of life education, so that everyones visit to the Shoushan Zoo is the starting point of happy memories. In addition to Ali the elephant, Shoushan Zoo currently has two white rhinos, male Xiqi from the Taipei City Zoo and female Baby who was bred naturally in the zoo. nWhite rhino Xiqi was loaned to Shoushan Zoo in hope that he could successfully mate with the female white rhino Baby to raise the white rhino population.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The charm of cute rabbits is irresistible! An old man raised hundreds of rabbits?! Playful little rabbits are spoiled yet timid! programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Home Cooking
programme.desc: From a homerun Greek dinner party series to a backyard thats become a gourmet deli to a Burmese pop up running out of an apartment kitchen, Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Side Hustles
programme.desc: From a lawyer to an actor to an insurance analyst, Stephanie discovers a world of folks whove turned their passion for cooking into side hustle food businesses. From dumplings, sushi and pretzels she explores how they balance their day jobs.

programme.title: Life After Restaurants
programme.desc: From backyard mariscos to Cantonese remixes of British hand pies to made-to-order slap noodles, Stephanie catches hangs with 3 chefs who left the traditional restaurant scene and found alternative ways to cook for a living and make the food they love

programme.title: Cooking with Fire
programme.desc: Stephanie meets 3 cooks who use fire in different ways to create distinct dishes. Using their love of cooking over an open flame; these cooks introduce her to the diverse flavors of Armenia; a classic Italian hero, and infrared grilled Brazilian BBQ

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza vans mobile oven.

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: The Chicken Episode
programme.desc: If youre going to grill chicken, youll want to make it good. Chef Dale likes to kick up the heat with his angry chicken, a spicy, spatchcocked and grilled whole chicken, and his kung pao chicken wings.

programme.title: Brunch On The Grill
programme.desc: Wake up, its time to grill! Chef Dale greets the day with a showstopping dutch baby pancake and tangerine syrup, crispy hash browns topped with creme fraiche and roe, and a ham steak smothered in sweet cherry mostarda and red eye gravy.

programme.title: Vegetables, But Delicious
programme.desc: Grilling is the perfect way to imbue your veggies with deliciousness. Chef Dale crafts a family style platter of trumpet mushrooms, eggplant marinated in spicy ssam jang, and charred yellow squash served with a green goddess dressing.

programme.title: Kabobs and Skewers
programme.desc: Kabobs and skewers are a family tradition for Chef Dale. This Mediterranean-inspired meal features beef and shrimp kabobs with grilled tomatoes, potatoes, and eggplant, all served on warm pita with a tangy white sauce.

programme.title: End of Summer Seafood Feast
programme.desc: The end of summer is near, and Chef Dale goes out in style with a giant seafood feast! Lobster, crab, clams, shrimp, and scallops, all served directly on the table with plenty of buttery garlic bread. Thanks for watching, and until we grill again!

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and dont forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Sausage Egg And Cheese All Day Long
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings out the best of brunch with sweet and savory hits such as Bacon Wrapped Dates Stuffed with Chorizo, Maple Sausage, Egg, And Cheese Fried Rice, and the tastiest BBQ Duck, Egg, And Corn Scallion Pancake Sandwiches youve ever eaten.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Perfectly Prepared Steaks
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, And grill up the biggest and best steaks out there. From a Hanger Steak with Salsa Verde to a Ribeye with Ginger Chili Relish, and tops it all off with the father of all steaks The Porterhouse.

programme.title: Pizza Party on the Grill
programme.desc: Its Pizza Time! Chef Dale Talde grills up amazing pizzas for every palate including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie with a Spiced Chick Peas And Potatoes, and gives your childhood favorite French Bread Pizza a much needed upgrade.

programme.title: End of Summer Seafood Feast

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: The Chicken Episode
programme.desc: If youre going to grill chicken, youll want to make it good. Chef Dale likes to kick up the heat with his angry chicken, a spicy, spatchcocked and grilled whole chicken, and his kung pao chicken wings.

programme.title: Brunch On The Grill
programme.desc: Wake up, its time to grill! Chef Dale greets the day with a showstopping dutch baby pancake and tangerine syrup, crispy hash browns topped with creme fraiche and roe, and a ham steak smothered in sweet cherry mostarda and red eye gravy.

programme.title: Over the Top Holiday Cakes
programme.desc: Mia Starr gives a crash course in her all-time favorite, most used decorating techniques. From piping styles to watercolor frosting to maximalist designs, she teaches the basics of holiday cake decorating, in her own signature style.

programme.title: Fantastic Pastry Presents
programme.desc: Tis the season for gift giving! Mia walks us through her favorite pastry presents to give to loved ones. From classic cookie gift tins to no bake cheesecakes to savory bakes of cheese and crackers. There is something here for everyone on your list.

programme.title: Bakes On A Budget
programme.desc: Money can be tight around the holidays. From the $3 cookies you will have to try to believe, to a show-stopping $25 trifle, Mia has got you covered - just because youre on a budget doesnt mean you have to skimp on style or taste!

programme.title: Bakes Around The World
programme.desc: Join Mia on a trip around the world without leaving the kitchen! From the Japanese Christmas Cake to Jewish Rugelach to German Pfeffernusse to Mexican Bunuelos. Your taste buds will get a tour with these holiday bakes from around the world.

programme.title: Hack Your Holidays
programme.desc: In this episode, you dont even need to turn on your oven! From a jaw-dropping cake hack, to fried biscuit donuts, you wont believe what you can do with pre-made desserts from the supermarket. Mia will show hacks and great tips for any home-baker!

programme.title: Baked With Pride
programme.desc: Mia Starr supports her LGBTQ+ community while baking up colorful creations including a Beautiful Baked Alaska, a Fresh Fruit Tart, a Citrus Marble Cake, and a Radiant Rainbow Crepe Cake. Let your Pride flag fly and your tastebuds will thank you!

programme.title: Summer Bakes
programme.desc: Cue the fireworks, were celebrating the 4th of July and summer! Mia is bringing the treats perfect for your neighborhood block party or while grilling in the backyard. Ice cream sandwiches, grilled fruit cupcakes, and fun twists on old favorites!

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Hair-raising Halloween Cakes
programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Spooky Halloween Party Bakes
programme.desc: Make your Halloween Party the talk of every boy and ghoul in the neighborhood! Whether its the poisoned apples, the drippy candle cakes, coffin pies or savory treats (or tricks) these delicious bakes will surely delight and scare.

programme.title: A Thanksgiving Harvest
programme.desc: Time to dig in to the one holiday of the year that is all about the food! Think outside the pumpkin pie crust for these four unique offerings. Mias got you covered with the bread, two show-stopping desserts, and a creative way to use your leftovers!

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Gingerbread Spectacular!
programme.desc: Its time to celebrate all things gingerbread! This classic holiday flavor gets an update from Mia. From the not-so-basic cake, to the most delectable cookie, and finally the ultimate gingerbread house; Mia will show why this is a holiday staple.

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: Pizza Party on the Grill
programme.desc: Its Pizza Time! Chef Dale Talde grills up amazing pizzas for every palate including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie with a Spiced Chick Peas And Potatoes, and gives your childhood favorite French Bread Pizza a much needed upgrade.

programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.desc: Mad Good Food Host Derrell Smith joins Chef Dale Talde at the grill as they cook up some stupendous sandwiches including a Salmon Pastrami Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even some Grilled Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings your basic burgers to a new level with his dry-aged beef burger with potatoes and truffle dijon mayo, a part-beef part-pork belly burger with cheddar And an egg, and lastly a crispy mushroom tortilla burger with salsa And cheese.

programme.title: Luxe Lobster And Prime Rib
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde pulls out all the stops for this daddy-sized dinner. He grills up prime rib with herb And horseradish crust, lobster And chili sauce American, charred green beans with garlic tahini, and cheddar-stuffed parker house rolls.

programme.title: Summer Seafood Smorgasbord
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets his beach vibes going with a grilled shrimp And lobster cocktail, clams with lemon breadcrumbs, a killer grilled king crab with burnt citrus butter, and a chilled mango frozen daiquiri. Dont you dare miss this beach party!

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab And Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, And sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn And Potatoes
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde puts a modern spin on a classic All-American cookout with his loaded hot dogs, spiced smashed potato salad, chorizo And corn nut crusted corn, and bangin banana pudding pops. Sparklers out for this spread!

programme.title: Scrumptious Summer Sandwiches
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde channels his inner sandwich lover by making an angry lobster club with pepper aioli and grilled bacon, a lamb birria torta with avocado and ramen consomme, and his an Italian beef combo with chili crisp cheese sauce, and giardiniera.

programme.title: Pizzapalooza
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is throwin down a pizza spread like never before with his Chicago-style tavern pie with sausage And onion, a grilled pizza pocket with pepperoni And cheese, chicken wings a la pizzaiola, and a zesty grilled caesar salad to finish it off.

programme.title: The Future is Flavor
programme.desc: Frankie harnesses the power of time to transform simple ingredients into flavorful goods thatll stick around for a long time. Learn the basics of preserving, pickling And curing to make dinner anything but a struggle. It just takes a little patience.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Eggscellent Techniques
programme.desc: In this special technique episode, Frankie teaches us several methods for cooking a quintessential ingredient: eggs. The scramble, the omelet, the Benedict learn to make them just the way you like them.

programme.title: Cabbage, cabbage, cabbage
programme.desc: Cabbage has long been an underrated green on the field, and its about time Frankie gives it a starring role. This leafy head proves itself as the versatile ingredient we need it to be, affordable year around, delicious and filling.

programme.title: An Eggplant Extravaganza
programme.desc: Eggplant: A fruit you didnt know was a fruit. Often underrated and overlooked, Frankie shows us how to shop for and cook this filling, delicious, cost-effective, and versatile ingredient. The days of mushy, bitter eggplant will be long gone.

programme.title: Plant-Based Budget Meals
programme.desc: Frankie busts the myth that eating plant-based is expensive. Preparing these good-for-you meals is all about eating seasonally and shopping the bulk aisle to save money on produce. Its nutritious and great for the planet. Win-win!

programme.title: The Weekly Struggle Budget
programme.desc: Frankie figured out the weekly budget grocery equation so you dont have to. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner for seven days, for a family of four, for under $150. All it takes is a little planning, meal prep, and using up leftovers in inventive ways.

programme.title: Turn Up For Tomatoes
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to prepare tomatoes fresh in a variety of ways. And for even more savings, Frankie will share a few tips on how to preserve them so you can enjoy their freshness throughout the year.

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: Date night doesnt have to be at an over-priced, mediocre restaurant. Frankie prepares an affordable and delicious sushi date night at home, plus tips on how to set date night ambiance at home on a struggle budget. That special someone will love it!

programme.title: Lunches for Work
programme.desc: A big way to save money is to prepare homemade lunches for work. Frankie shows us how to make five delicious lunches for the whole work week. Youll be saving money, and you might even be more productive at work after a nutritious homemade lunch!

programme.title: Party for Pennies
programme.desc: Frankie makes three dishes for a party of four, that when combined, are cheaper than just one meal out for brunch. Then, its a taco party for five people for only $20!

programme.title: Food Back from the Dead
programme.desc: Stale bread, old bananas, canned food, dry foods... theyve all gotten a bad wrap, but this is not the end of them yet! Dont let this stuff sit in the pantry, dont let it go to waste - Frankie encourages you to stretch further and cheaper!
