programme.desc: Its Pizza Time! Chef Dale Talde grills up amazing pizzas for every palate including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie with a Spiced Chick Peas And Potatoes, and gives your childhood favorite French Bread Pizza a much needed upgrade.

programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.desc: Mad Good Food Host Derrell Smith joins Chef Dale Talde at the grill as they cook up some stupendous sandwiches including a Salmon Pastrami Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even some Grilled Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings your basic burgers to a new level with his dry-aged beef burger with potatoes and truffle dijon mayo, a part-beef part-pork belly burger with cheddar And an egg, and lastly a crispy mushroom tortilla burger with salsa And cheese.

programme.title: Luxe Lobster And Prime Rib
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde pulls out all the stops for this daddy-sized dinner. He grills up prime rib with herb And horseradish crust, lobster And chili sauce American, charred green beans with garlic tahini, and cheddar-stuffed parker house rolls.

programme.title: Summer Seafood Smorgasbord
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets his beach vibes going with a grilled shrimp And lobster cocktail, clams with lemon breadcrumbs, a killer grilled king crab with burnt citrus butter, and a chilled mango frozen daiquiri. Dont you dare miss this beach party!

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab And Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, And sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn And Potatoes
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde puts a modern spin on a classic All-American cookout with his loaded hot dogs, spiced smashed potato salad, chorizo And corn nut crusted corn, and bangin banana pudding pops. Sparklers out for this spread!

programme.title: The Future is Flavor
programme.desc: Frankie harnesses the power of time to transform simple ingredients into flavorful goods thatll stick around for a long time. Learn the basics of preserving, pickling And curing to make dinner anything but a struggle. It just takes a little patience.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Eggscellent Techniques
programme.desc: In this special technique episode, Frankie teaches us several methods for cooking a quintessential ingredient: eggs. The scramble, the omelet, the Benedict learn to make them just the way you like them.

programme.title: Cabbage, cabbage, cabbage
programme.desc: Cabbage has long been an underrated green on the field, and its about time Frankie gives it a starring role. This leafy head proves itself as the versatile ingredient we need it to be, affordable year around, delicious and filling.

programme.title: A Thanksgiving Harvest
programme.desc: Time to dig in to the one holiday of the year that is all about the food! Think outside the pumpkin pie crust for these four unique offerings. Mias got you covered with the bread, two show-stopping desserts, and a creative way to use your leftovers!

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Gingerbread Spectacular!
programme.desc: Its time to celebrate all things gingerbread! This classic holiday flavor gets an update from Mia. From the not-so-basic cake, to the most delectable cookie, and finally the ultimate gingerbread house; Mia will show why this is a holiday staple.

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: Pizza Party on the Grill
programme.desc: Its Pizza Time! Chef Dale Talde grills up amazing pizzas for every palate including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie with a Spiced Chick Peas And Potatoes, and gives your childhood favorite French Bread Pizza a much needed upgrade.

programme.title: Grill These Sandwiches
programme.desc: Mad Good Food Host Derrell Smith joins Chef Dale Talde at the grill as they cook up some stupendous sandwiches including a Salmon Pastrami Reuben, a Meatball Banh Mi, and even some Grilled Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings your basic burgers to a new level with his dry-aged beef burger with potatoes and truffle dijon mayo, a part-beef part-pork belly burger with cheddar And an egg, and lastly a crispy mushroom tortilla burger with salsa And cheese.

programme.title: Luxe Lobster And Prime Rib
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde pulls out all the stops for this daddy-sized dinner. He grills up prime rib with herb And horseradish crust, lobster And chili sauce American, charred green beans with garlic tahini, and cheddar-stuffed parker house rolls.

programme.title: Summer Seafood Smorgasbord
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets his beach vibes going with a grilled shrimp And lobster cocktail, clams with lemon breadcrumbs, a killer grilled king crab with burnt citrus butter, and a chilled mango frozen daiquiri. Dont you dare miss this beach party!

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab And Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, And sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn And Potatoes
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde puts a modern spin on a classic All-American cookout with his loaded hot dogs, spiced smashed potato salad, chorizo And corn nut crusted corn, and bangin banana pudding pops. Sparklers out for this spread!

programme.title: Scrumptious Summer Sandwiches
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde channels his inner sandwich lover by making an angry lobster club with pepper aioli and grilled bacon, a lamb birria torta with avocado and ramen consomme, and his an Italian beef combo with chili crisp cheese sauce, and giardiniera.

programme.title: Pizzapalooza
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde is throwin down a pizza spread like never before with his Chicago-style tavern pie with sausage And onion, a grilled pizza pocket with pepperoni And cheese, chicken wings a la pizzaiola, and a zesty grilled caesar salad to finish it off.

programme.title: Side Hustles
programme.desc: From a lawyer to an actor to an insurance analyst, Stephanie discovers a world of folks whove turned their passion for cooking into side hustle food businesses. From dumplings, sushi and pretzels she explores how they balance their day jobs.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Cooking with Fire
programme.desc: Stephanie meets 3 cooks who use fire in different ways to create distinct dishes. Using their love of cooking over an open flame; these cooks introduce her to the diverse flavors of Armenia; a classic Italian hero, and infrared grilled Brazilian BBQ

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.title: Taste Selebriti
programme.desc: A food-travelogue program where 13 local celebrities will return to their hometowns to share traditional cuisines, unique foods and popular dishes in their states.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara dan meneroka sendiri budaya dan tempat-tempat menarik.

programme.title: Semmaiyaana Saapadu
programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ke Kelate
programme.desc: Join alter ego Catriona Ross as she uncovers the most popular dishes, iconic locations, hidden gems and, as always, the vibrant people on her travels throughout Kelantan.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.

programme.title: Dari Kebun Ke Dapur

programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: A Year-end Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Years Eve.

programme.title: The Roundup: No Way Out
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: Hidden Face
programme.desc: While Sung-jin is searching for his fiancee Su-yeon, he meets her friend Mi-ju. A breathtaking thriller unfolds in which Su-yeon, who is trapped in a secret room, witnesses a naked truth.

programme.title: I Dont Fire Myself
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: 4pm
programme.desc: A couple moved to a new house, dreaming of a peaceful country life. But they face a terrifying reality due to their neighbor, who visits them at the same time every day with just silence...

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the worlds most legendary con man.

programme.title: Il Mare
programme.desc: A young woman from 1999 and a young man from 1997 begin a parallel-time love story separated by a span of two years when they start to receive each others letters in the mailbox.

programme.title: A Year-end Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Years Eve.

programme.title: The Kings Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: A Reason to Live
programme.desc: TV producer Da-hye lost her fiance in an accident. She forgave the young criminal and moved on. A year later, she starts filming a documentary on forgiveness and is shocked to find out...

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Roundup: No Way Out
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mothers surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as Nobleman...

programme.title: Usury Academy
programme.desc: Kang-jin is bullied as the lowest-ranking boy at school with no presence and money. He starts a business on private loans by chance and soon rises to the top of the school hierarchy.

programme.title: The King
programme.desc: Believing power is paramount, Tae-soo aspires to become a prosecutor. As he achieves his goal and rises swiftly to power, he also sees the cruelty of a life at the top hierarchy in 90s Korea.

programme.title: I (2021)
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Long Live the King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: The Kings Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: Hear Me: Our Summer
programme.desc: Yong-jun is working as a delivery man when he meets and instantly falls for Yeo-reum, the devoted sister of a gifted deaf swimmer. Yeo-reum slowly opens her heart to warm-hearted Yong-jun.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E26
programme.desc: Max piensa que Camila lo rechazo por Roberto. En confesion con el Padre Tiziano, le aconseja que le cuente toda la verdad a Max, pero ella teme que Roberto la denuncie por asesina. Julia y Gregorio vuelven a encontrarse.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E27
programme.desc: Camila es atropellada por un desconocido que le advierte que deje de buscar a Rosa Blanco. Esto la inquieta y acude a Max pero el le dice que no lo involucre ms en este asunto. Todos temen el regreso de Rosa Blanco.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E45
programme.desc: Israel conversa con Ral sobre el incidente ocurrido con Lucely cuando aparece Clara Ines buscando ayuda para ir al hospicio a ver a Rafael.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E46
programme.desc: Gabriel se presenta en la clnica donde esta Rafael para ver a Clara Ines. Le pide al enfurecido Ral que se quede con el nio.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E45
programme.desc: Alberto se entera que la mujer es la mam del ex de Lorena, y quiere sacarle dinero. Alberto confronta a Lorena, pidiendole que le diga toda la verdad sobre Nilda.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E42
programme.desc: El medico le comunica a Carlos Ral que la severa lesion que padece Cesar en la cabeza podra causarle la muerte tarde o temprano.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E43
programme.desc: Salvatore intenta evadir la pregunta de su hijo sobre las nuevas negociaciones alegando que deben viajar. En un estallido, Cesar le pregunta a su padre si se va a morir.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E44
programme.desc: En un nuevo da, un deprimido Cesar es sorprendido por Adriana quien ha ido a visitarlo acompaado de la pequea Tatianita.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E007 - Episodio 7
programme.desc: Nicols asegura a Fernanda que su camino no volver a cruzarse con el de Victoria. Rosendo est decidido a hacer pagar a Hilario lo que le debe. Pablo (Nicols) se ofrece a acompaar a Victoria a comprar un auto. Liliana le deja un sobre a Nicols en casa de los Alcoy. Victoria est a punto de descubrir la verdadera identidad de Pablo (Nicols).

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E008 - Episodio 8
programme.desc: Rosendo y Florencia logran escapar de los hombres de Hilario. Victoria y Pablo (Nicols) se besan. Antonieta decide aceptar la propuesta de matrimonio que le hizo Jons. Clemencia ofrece a Victoria guardarle el secreto de su romance y hacerle creer a Carmencita que andan juntas. Victoria y Pablo (Nicols) se confiesan mutuamente que se aman; el est dispuesto a contarle todo lo que ella ignora sobre el.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E46
programme.desc: Una vez ms, Malena es vctima de los celos y la furia de Pablo, quien la toma del cabello y la arrastra reclamndole su infidelidad con Alfonso. Ricardo re por la manera tan fcil que engao a las Maras. Omar tratando de cuadrar la historia en torno al sicario. Entre promesas de amor y la pasion que los consume, Lorena y Alberto se entregan en cuerpo y alma.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E47
programme.desc: Pablo recibe la visita de un delincuente que le facilita un arma sin registro, para que pueda matar a su mujer sin ser rastreado. Alberto trabaja en un artculo para el periodico, cuando Lorena llega a su encuentro; siguiendo instrucciones de Gertrudis, le asoma a Alberto que Claudio est enamorado de su mam.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E07 - Geological Disasters
programme.desc: A veces, todo lo que se necesita es un movimiento bajo los pies.... Horas desesperadas examina las principales catstrofes geologicas, como las avalanchas de Afganistn, Pakistn, Nepal, Per y Francia. Tambien analiza desprendimientos geologicos en Filipinas, India y Colombia y un enorme socavon que consumio un estanque en Bosnia. Tambien analiza las ventiscas en Estados Unidos, Israel y Reino Unido.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E08 - Nuclear Industrial
programme.desc: Cuando los seres humanos son un grave peligro para s mismos ... Horas desesperadas analiza catstrofes nucleares e industriales como el desastre de la central nuclear de Fukushima en Japon, el de la central nuclear de Chernobil en Ucrania, el vertido de petroleo en aguas profundas del Golfo de Mexico, el del Savar Plaza en Bangladesh y el del gas de Bhopal en la India. Cuando se produce una catstrofe en una central nuclear, el desastre resultante puede ser, literalmente, fuera de escala y durar decadas.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E09 - Disaster at Sea
programme.desc: La navegacion es un negocio peligroso, de hecho...... Las horas desesperadas repasa las principales catstrofes ocurridas en alta mar, como el desastre del transbordador Sewol en Corea del Sur, el Ferry Estonia en el mar Bltico, el hundimiento del Titanic, el Exxon Valdez en Prince William Sound Alaska, el Express Samina en Portes Islets, los ataques piratas al Maersk Alabama y al Seabourn Spirit, y el Costa Concordia en el mar Mediterrneo.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E10 - Disaster in the Air
programme.desc: Where the black box is the only story teller...... Los accidentes aereos son las peores pesadillas de la mayora de la gente. Horas desesperadas repasa las principales catstrofes de la historia de la aviacion, como los vuelos MH17 y MH370 de Malaysia Airlines, el vuelo 447 de Air France, el vuelo 9525 de Germanwings, el desastre del aeropuerto de Tenerife, las catstrofes de los transbordadores espaciales Challenger y Columbia, el accidente del C-130 de la Fuerza Aerea Indonesia en Sumatra en 2015, el accidente del Antonov An-124 de Irkutsk en 1997 y el accidente del vuelo 4590 del Concorde.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E01 - A Family Affair
programme.desc: En los remotos rincones de la sabana de Alaska hay recompensas sin igual. spera, cruda y ahora cocinada, esta es la ltima frontera culinaria donde un chef est redefiniendo lo que significa comer como un salvaje. Los clientes quisquillosos, los cambios climticos bipolares y la escasez de alimentos y suministros a menudo llevan a Bradley al lmite de su cordura, pero este espritu creativo y libre siempre cumple.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E02 - Surfers Delight
programme.desc: En la cocina de pruebas definitiva del Planeta, este episodio sirve una cena especial para un grupo de surfistas, pero se avecina una tormenta. Ser una cena para recordar. En el men, una ensalada verde mixta con vinagreta de frambuesa, gelatina de pescado blanco con pepino y salsa de maz, seguido de fletn a la plancha y polenta.

programme.title: Alaskas Wild Gourmet - S01:E03 - Hunters Paradise
programme.desc: Catering fuera de la red no es fcil y la familia Ewing lo sabe. A un grupo de 8 cazadores se les servir una ensalada de remolacha seguida de estofado de venado y de postre tarta de queso con arndanos rojos.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E42 - Diana A Model Princess
programme.desc: Dianas fashion sense was something people often looked at closely. She had a knack for picking outfits that were both stylish and sophisticated, which always grabbed attention. Her hats were another standout feature; she often wore elegant designs that added a touch of grace to her look. Her hair was also iconic, usually styled neatly with a slight bounce, perfectly framing her face and adding to her elegant appearance.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S02:E01 - Naturally Wild
programme.desc: Muchas islas se encuentran en el mar entre Gran Bretaa y Escandinavia. Todas estas islas habran permanecido cubiertas de nieve y la vida no habra sido sostenible de no ser por la Corriente del Golfo. Las aguas clidas que fluyen por el Oceano Atlntico hasta Sudamerica explican el clima templado de las islas, su rica naturaleza y una historia que se remonta miles de aos atrs. As son las tres islas que vamos a visitar hoy en Milagros de la Naturaleza: Vesterlen, la Isla Justa y las Orcadas.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S02:E02- Naturally Noble
programme.desc: Zimbabue era inicialmente Rodesia del Sur y se encuentra al sur de las cataratas Victoria, junto al ro Zambeze. Zambia era inicialmente Rodesia del Norte y se encuentra en la otra orilla del ro. Zimbabue es un pas sin salida al mar situado en el sureste de frica. Limita al sur con Sudfrica. Segn los arqueologos, los primeros registros indican que los primeros asentamientos humanos en esta zona se remontan al siglo III.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S20:E03 - Glacier Gold
programme.desc: Esta semana en Gold Fever, Tom y su hijo Kael estn bajo un enorme glaciar, buscando pepitas de oro.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S20:E04 - The Ghosts of Pine Log
programme.desc: Esta semana en Fiebre del Oro Tom y su hija Kia vuelven sobre sus pasos visitando la antigua propiedad de Pine Log en California.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E01 - Rhino Wars
programme.desc: Carters W.A.R. (Wild Animal Response) es la historia jams contada de la bsqueda de un hombre para salvar su tierra natal, el continente ms salvaje y peligroso del mundo, frica. Desde cazadores furtivos fuertemente armados que masacran elefantes por sus colmillos hasta la matanza de rinocerontes por sus cuernos, el recurso ms preciado de frica est en peligro. Puede un hombre descubrir la verdad y cambiar las cosas? Vea como Ivan Carter, detective y cazador profesional de animales salvajes, le lleva al interior del frica real, al frente de las guerras que se libran contra su fauna salvaje.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S02:E03 - Naturally Sustaining
programme.desc: Nuestro viaje en busca de increbles milagros de la naturaleza comienza en las Islas Canarias. Lanzarote es de origen volcnico. La actividad volcnica creo un paisaje fantstico, similar al de Marte. En Gran Canarias seremos testigos de una cosecha tradicional de un cultivo que desde aqu se ha llevado al resto del mundo: la caa de azcar. Terminaremos este episodio en la provincia marroqu de Gulemin, hogar de una tribu nomada cuyos compaeros inseparables son los camellos.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S02:E04 - Naturally Colourful
programme.desc: Adentrese en el estado costero mexicano de Veracruz, al suroeste del pas, y admire los increbles colores de las orqudeas cultivadas en la zona. Descubra como se cultiva la vainilla y como se elabora el azcar moreno. Como colofon, asista a un extraordinario ritual. Ms tarde, visitaremos las Islas Caimn, en el Caribe. Las tres islas son relativamente pequeas, pero estn habitadas por algunos animales extraordinarios, como tortugas marinas, simpticas rayas y otros tipos de peces, as como fascinantes iguanas azules.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S20:E05 - Burnt River
programme.desc: Esta semana en Fiebre del Oro Tom y su hija Kia buscan oro en el este de Oregon.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S20:E06 - Golden Flight
programme.desc: Esta semana en Fiebre del Oro, Tom y su hijo Kael, dragan en Anchorage, intentando encontrar oro para el regalo de cumpleaos de Cindy.

programme.desc: Ivan Carter trabaja para salvar a un elefante clave de los cazadores furtivos de marfil cerca del famoso Parque Nacional Kruger de frica.
